bibdata.title: IEEE Trial-Use Guide for Partial Discharge Measurement in Liquid-Filled Power Transformers and Shunt Reactors
IEEE Trial-Use Guide for Partial Discharge Measurement in Liquid-Filled Power Transformers and Shunt Reactors
bibdata.docidentifier: ANSI/IEEE Std: Transformers and Shunt Reactors

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This test procedure applies to the detection and measurement by the wide-band apparent charge method of partial discharges occuring in liquid-filled power transformers and shunt reactors during dielectric test where applicable.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
